<title level="1" right="Hazard 16" pfs="">[Freezing Floor Tiles](/Hazards.aspx?ID=57)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Cold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=27" />
<trait label="Complex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=30" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 45</row>

**Complexity** Complex

</column>

Four remote sensors at each corner of the arena cause bursts of freezing magic to erupt from random tiles on the arena and stop creatures in their tracks.

---

**Stealth**
+23 (expert) or DC 38 (master) to notice the four sensors

**Disable**
DC 40 [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) (legendary) or [_dispel magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=78) (6th level; [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) DC 38) to disable one of the sensors

<column gap="tiny">

**AC** 36, **Fort** +33, **Ref** +30

**Sensor Hardness**
20

**Sensor HP**
40 (BT 20)

**Immunities**
[cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27); 

**Weaknesses**
[fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) 15

</column>

**Frigid Floor** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27)); **Trigger** Hao Jin signals the beginning of the match. **Effect** The trap rolls initiative.

---
**Routine**
(4 actions) The trap loses 1 action per disabled sensor. On each action, the trap causes a random 10-foot-by-10-foot space in the arena to suddenly freeze. Each creature that begins its turn in a frozen space takes 2d6+2 cold damage (DC 40 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). A creature that critically fails its save also becomes [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) for 1 round; if it was already slowed, the creature instead becomes [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24) for 1 round. Any amount of fire damage dealt to a slowed or immobilized creature removes the condition. Frozen tiles become unfrozen at the beginning of the trap's next turn.
